title: Conveying Salam to the Prophet - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: people say convey your Salam to the Prophet Adam this is a clear any visions in Abdi or someone else from the descendants of the Prophet Isis I am so a man coming to the window next to the grave of the Prophet a son giving him Salam and he told him my son don't do this because by Allah you and the people in Anders in occupied Spain you and the people there are the same your Salam would reach the Prophet alakazam through the angel appointed by Allah Azza WA JAL so know it is a Novation to say convey myself to the prophets I mean he should not respond to that
